name: Galaxy Gauntlet
description:
Galaxy Gauntlet

Use gravity to escape and destroy enemies in this endless twin-stick shooter.

If the game doesn't detect your controller,  try reconnecting it with the game open.

Programming - QuietBenchZen

Created for Weekly Game Jam 175 "Two-Button Physics"
